===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=かげろう}}
Change in meaning from {{m|ja|陽炎|tr=kagerō||heat haze, heat shimmer}}, from the way that the insects fly in swarms that visually resemble heat haze.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
